name: Suspicious Outbound Kerberos Connection
description: Detects suspicious outbound network activity via kerberos default port indicating possible lateral movement or first stage PrivEsc via delegation.
query: ((destination.port:88 AND network.direction:/[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]/) AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Oo][Mm][Cc][Aa][Tt]\\[Bb][Ii][Nn]\\[Tt][Oo][Mm][Cc][Aa][Tt]8\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((destination.port:88 AND network.direction:true) AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\lsass.exe OR *\\opera.exe OR *\\chrome.exe OR *\\firefox.exe OR *\\tomcat\\bin\\tomcat8.exe))))`
